attributes.action: Ban Britian First. It is a terrorist organisation that targets specific people.
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May said today (Thursday 30th November 2017): ‘Britain First is a hateful organisation. It seeks to spread division and mistrust among our communities. It stands in fundamental opposition to the values we share as a nation – values of respect, tolerance and common British decency.


Read more: http://metro.co.uk/2017/11/30/theresa-may-says-donald-trumps-britain-first-retweets-were-the-wrong-thing-to-do-7121879/?ito=cbshare
attributes.background:
Britian First is a terrorist group that seeks to terrorise specific groups of our community.  
It is fuelled by hatred which has no space in our country or the world. 
Ban this group and criminalise membership to this organisation that seeks to create divisions. 
Theresa May has condemned them.
